regen.absent_element: time delay or scheduling for the request
regen.new_specification: The system shall support delayed or scheduled activation/deactivation of the heating/cooling unit.
The system shall assign and process requests based on priority levels.

regen.absent_element: confirmation or acknowledgment mechanism for executed requests
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide feedback upon successful or failed execution of the heating/cooling request.

label: This request shall indicate whether that unit is to be turned on or off
absence: indication of on/off status in the request
